title: The Screams of Joy after the last Promotion Game is won!
body: Do you react the same or differently? =D

replies.body:
Last season when I stared playing ranked I took it like it was a normal game and I won 65% of my games and I was happy each time I won and then one day I was promoted to Silver and I screamed so loud and long that the police arrive 20 minutes later and they were called of a noise complaint. So I was kind of confused when they came. (because they came so late) Then like here is me all confused halfway through another League game why the police are banging on my door. Then I had to explain why the police was called and then they left and I was fined for prank calling the police even though I never called them.

So now I don't celebrate whenever I win unless it was a massive comeback or I ranked up.

> [{quoted}](name=Zahe Jr,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kgEIrp3m,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-12T13:59:43.022+0000)
>
> Last season when I stared playing ranked I took it like it was a normal game and I won 65% of my games and I was happy each time I won and then one day I was promoted to Silver and I screamed so loud and long that the police arrive 20 minutes later and they were called of a noise complaint. So I was kind of confused when they came. (because they came so late) Then like here is me all confused halfway through another League game why the police are banging on my door. Then I had to explain why the police was called and then they left and I was fined for prank calling the police even though I never called them.
> 
> So now I don't celebrate whenever I win unless it was a massive comeback or I ranked up.

Haha! That story is hilarious. *like* :D

Awesome work. 

I would not call that screaming tho lol. More like a lack of enthusiasm screaming

> I would not call that screaming tho lol. More like a lack of enthusiasm screaming

Thanks, bro!
You sound like Mario in Mario Kart #fyi #veryimportant #kappa #grats #ggwp
